title: kurtbroppa's artwork hub
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Hi guys, my name is kurtbroppa and I am a artist from Turkey. This page is for showcasing my fanart for SCP foundation collaborative fiction project.

[[collapsible show="Elias Shaw" hide="Plurality of Elias Shaw"]]
[[image EliasShaw.png]]

An art I made for a possible postcard.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Researcher fox"]]
[[image ResearcherFox-1.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Dr.Alto Clef" hide="Ukulele Man"]]
[[image Dr.Clef-1.png]]

The pistol is pretty bad tbh.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP 4498"]]

[[image EliasShawillustfin.png]]

An art I made for the SCP 4498 manga. It has the old version of my Shaw design.

[[image SCP4498cover-1.png]]

This cover is my first attempt in the cover of SCP4498 manga. Sadly, my editor rejected it.

[[image SCP4498cover-2.png]]

This is the second and final cover for the 4498 manga.
[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="SCP 076" hide="Able"]]
[[image SCP076-2.png]]

Able fan art.
[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="SCP 682" hide="Hard to Destroy Reptile"]]
[[image SCP682.png]]

Painting of my favorite reptile.
[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="SCP 3000" hide="Anantashesha"]]
[[image SCP-3000-1.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP 049" hide="Plague Doctor"]]
[[image SCP049-1.png]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SCP 8600" hide="Her Golden Wings Covered In Blood"]]
[[image SCP-8600.png]]
[[/collapsible]]
author: kurtbroppa
